sen.j: 忌寸（いみき）は、684年（天武天皇13年）に制定された八色の姓（やくさのかばね）の制度で新たに作られた姓（かばね）で上から4番目。
sen.e: Imiki was newly-created Kabane (hereditary title) due to the establishment of Yakusa no Kabane (the eight honorary titles) and it was the fourth rank from the top.
Imiki was one of the kabane (hereditary titles) established by Yakusa no Kabane (the eight hereditary titles) in 684, and it was placed as the fourth rank.
sen.cmt: 他の記事と表現を統一しました。684年 を追加しました。
sen.e: Imiki was one of the kabane (hereditary titles) established by Yakusa no Kabane (the eight hereditary titles) in 684, and it was placed as the fourth rank.

sen.j: 直（あたえ）姓の国造や、渡来人系の氏族に与えられた。
sen.e: Imiki was given to the Kuni no Miyatsuko (the heads of local governments) who had Atae and settlers clan.

Imiki was given to the Kuninomiyatsuko (the heads of local governments) who already had the title of Atae or clans whose ancestors are toraijin (people from overseas, especially from China and Korea, who settled in early Japan and introduced Continental culture to the Japanese).
sen.cmt: 渡来人 補足を追加しました。
sen.e: Imiki was given to the Kuninomiyatsuko (the heads of local governments) who already had the title of Atae or clans whose ancestors are toraijin (people from overseas, especially from China and Korea, who settled in early Japan and introduced Continental culture to the Japanese).
